date.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel that the data pertains to.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video watched on the channel.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the video was watched live or on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer is subscribed to the channel or not.

country_code.description: The country code of the viewers watching videos on the channel.

device_type.description: The type of device used by viewers to access the channel, such as mobile, desktop, or tablet.

operating_system.description: The operating system of the device used by viewers to watch videos on the channel.

views.description: The total number of views on a video or channel during a specific period.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes for videos watched on the channel, reflecting user engagement.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration in seconds that users watched videos on a channel, indicating user engagement.

average_view_duration_percentage.description: The average percentage of video viewed by users on a channel, representative of engagement level.

red_views.description: The number of views recognized as 'red views', possibly indicating unusual or invalid viewing activity.

red_watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes attributed to views classified as 'red views'.
